author: David Rosenberg
title: David Rosenberg: Recovery looms, but you’ll have to wait for it
description: Quick and dramatic action by the Fed and Washington has reduced the risk of depression, but we’re not out of the woods yet
content:
There’s an old saying, “Don’t fight the Fed,” but in the current environment, it’s “Don’t fight the Fed and the Feds.”
There’s a battle going on between the extent of the damage being done to the economy by the coronavirus and the massive response. We have t… [+7043 chars]
